    • Class io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.BaseRandom extends Random implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      -1556392727255964947L

      • Serialization Methods

        • readObject

          private void readObject(ObjectInputStream in)
                 throws IOException,
                        ClassNotFoundException
          Throws:
          IOException
          ClassNotFoundException

        • readObjectNoData

          private void readObjectNoData()
                       throws InvalidObjectException
          Used to deserialize a subclass instance that wasn't a subclass instance when it was serialized. Since that means we can't deserialize our seed, we generate a new one with the DefaultSeedGenerator.
          Throws:
          InvalidObjectException - if the DefaultSeedGenerator fails.

      • Serialized Fields

        • seederThread

          AtomicReference<V> seederThread
          If the referent is non-null, it will be invoked to reseed this PRNG whenever random output is taken and BaseRandom.getEntropyBits() called immediately afterward would return zero or negative.

        • nextNextGaussian

          AtomicLong nextNextGaussian

        • seed

          byte[] seed
          The seed this PRNG was seeded with, as a byte array. Used by BaseRandom.getSeed() even if the actual internal state of the PRNG is stored elsewhere (since otherwise getSeed() would require a slow type conversion).

        • entropyBits

          AtomicLong entropyBits
          Stores the entropy estimate backing BaseRandom.getEntropyBits().

  • Package io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.util

    • Class io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.util.LooperThread extends Thread implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      -4387051967625864310L

      • Serialization Methods

        • readObject

          private void readObject(ObjectInputStream in)
                 throws IOException,
                        ClassNotFoundException
          Used only to prepare subclasses before readResolve.
          Throws:
          IOException - When thrown by ObjectInputStream.defaultReadObject().
          ClassNotFoundException - When thrown by ObjectInputStream.defaultReadObject().

        • writeObject

          private void writeObject(ObjectOutputStream out)
                  throws IOException
          Throws:
          IOException

        • readResolve

          protected Object readResolve()
                      throws InvalidObjectException
          Deserialization uses readResolve rather than LooperThread.readObject(ObjectInputStream) alone, because the API of Thread only lets us set preferred stack size and thread serialGroup during construction and not update them afterwards.
          Throws:
          InvalidObjectException - if this LooperThread's serial form is invalid.

      • Serialized Fields

        • stackSize

          long stackSize
          The preferred stack size for this thread, in bytes, if it was specified during construction; 0 otherwise. Held for serialization purposes.

        • serialGroup

          ThreadGroup serialGroup
          The ThreadGroup this thread belongs to, if any. Held for serialization purposes.

        • name

          String name
          The name of this thread, if it has a non-default name. Held for serialization purposes.

        • interrupted

          boolean interrupted

        • daemon

          boolean daemon

        • priority

          int priority

        • state

          Thread.State state

        • contextClassLoader

          ClassLoader contextClassLoader

        • serialTarget

          Runnable serialTarget

        • serialUncaughtExceptionHandler

          Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler serialUncaughtExceptionHandler
